metadata.title: USN-6011-1 -- Json-smart vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Json-smart incorrectly handled memory when processing input containing unclosed quotes. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause applications using Json-smart to crash, leading to a denial of service. (CVE-2021-31684)  It was discovered that Json-smart incorrectly handled memory when processing input containing unclosed brackets. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause applications using Json-smart to crash, leading to a denial of service. (CVE-2023-1370)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6011-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libjson-smart-java - 2.2-2ubuntu0.20.04.1 No subscription required
